original: I found him the book.
translated: Je lui ai trouvé le livre.

original: Her voice sounds very beautiful.
translated: Sa voix est très belle.

original: I feel kind of tired.

original: The 26th of September is the European Day of Languages. The Council of Europe wants to draw attention to the multilingual heritage of Europe, to foster the evolution of multilingualism in society and to encourage citizens to learn languages​​. Tatoeba, as an easy-to-use learning tool and an active community, promotes the study and appreciation of languages in a very practical way.
translated: Le 26 septembre est la Journée européenne des langues. Le Conseil de l'Europe veut attirer l'attention sur l'héritage plurilingue de l'Europe, promouvoir le multilinguisme de la société et encourager les citoyens à apprendre des langues. Tatoeba, en tant que moyen d'en apprendre et en tant que communauté active, soutient l'apprentissage et la valorisation des langues d'une manière très pratique.

original: What? I can't hear you.

original: "If P, then Q" is logically equivalent to "If not Q, then not P".

translated: Qui, dans l'arc-en-ciel, peut tirer un trait entre là où finit la teinte violette et où la teinte orange commence ? Nous voyons distinctement la différence entre les couleurs mais où exactement l'une se fond-elle dans l'autre ? Il en va de même de la raison et de la folie.

original: Which language do you use when you speak to your parents?

original: Run!

original: I need the loo.

original: I thought you might want a drink.

original: Go nuts.

original: You can't ride a horse.

translated: Elles étaient aux antipodes l'une de l'autre : l'une était honnête et fiable tandis que l'autre était imprévisible et irresponsable.

original: Cobbler, stick to your last.

original: Sami had a plan and he was very patient.
translated: Sami avait un plan et il était très patient.

original: I'm learning Portuguese.

original: Which eye is hurting you?

translated: Ils ont exhumé le corps de Tom et lui ont offert un enterrement digne.

original: I didn't say it made sense.

original: They thought that they should do that.

original: Someone has brought us some grapes.

original: They're right.

translated: Je veux votre papier sur mon bureau d'ici mercredi.

original: Different strokes for different folks.

original: Tom's big-headed.

original: When you fall off the stairs, you're downstairs quickly.

translated: J'ai laissé ma boîte à outils au sous-sol, à côté de la chaudière.

original: Your pitching is far superior to mine.
translated: Votre lancer est bien meilleur que le mien.

original: I'd like a fork.

original: Great, another baby screaming on the airplane.

original: We're like family.

original: This book is older than that one.

original: What was she doing when you saw her?

original: Sami knew it was funny.

original: Tom got his nose pierced.

original: Tom is getting fat.

original: He just wants to have fun.

original: I don't remember that conversation.

original: She wouldn't be happy with him.

original: When nobody knows that something is, it's quite the same as if it were not.

translated: En octobre 1957, l'Union Soviétique a placé le premier satellite construit par l'homme (Spoutnik en russe) en orbite.

original: Passive houses don't require any active cooling or heating.
translated: Les maisons passives ne nécessitent pas de climatisation ou de chauffage actif.

original: We're still in shock.

original: I have connections in the government.

original: I picked up a coin.

original: Coastal cities will take the brunt of the storm.

original: I've said too much already.

original: I thought that you were working.

translated: Le voleur a fui avec l'argent.

original: That kind of food isn't really my thing.

original: Jessie is boiling water to make coffee.
translated: Jessie fait bouillir de l'eau pour faire le café.

original: I know what you could've done.

original: Are you out of your mind?

original: Prices have jumped.

original: I see you had to work late again last night.

original: They know what they have to do.

original: Where are the parking meters?

original: I'm not in the least interested in such things.

original: I'm offering you a choice.

original: I'll tell you.

original: I didn't flunk.

original: Can you speak up? I don't understand you.

original: Be at the station at eleven on the dot.

original: Don't push me!

original: I like your scarf.

original: Could we sit?

original: Stop crying for no reason.

translated: Quatre garçons se sont amusés en jouant aux cartes.

original: My children had eaten all the cookies by the time I got home.
translated: Mes enfants avaient mangé tous les biscuits à l'heure où je suis rentré chez moi.

original: You're confused again, aren't you?

original: Do you believe in guardian angels?

original: I know Tom can do that today.

original: Thus do all women.

original: This applies to your case as well.

original: I want to know how much time Tom spent doing that.

original: You are seeing a man.

original: What's so special about this?

original: I'm looking for you.

original: Tom tries.

original: I don't believe you've met him.

original: He's a modern boy.

original: I swim like a cow.

original: Everything seems normal enough.

original: He is introverted.

original: I really miss my husband.

original: Hopefully, things are well with you.

original: It was mesmerizing.

original: I'll be sitting here while he's singing.

original: This work is simple enough for a child to do.

original: The museum is open to the public.

original: I don't envy him.

original: Blame this rain!

original: It's getting late. I don't wanna go home alone.

original: We're going to do what we can.

original: I'll stay home tomorrow.

original: We have to go.

original: It's not necessary for us to do that.
translated: Il ne nous est pas nécessaire de faire cela.

original: They attempted to escape.
translated: Elles ont tenté de s'échapper.

original: Look it up in the dictionary.

translated: Tom m'a dit qu'il n'avait pas beaucoup de temps.

original: You almost died.

translated: Je ne veux vraiment pas être seule ce soir.

original: Get her.

original: She is a poor cook.

original: We will continue the discussion.

original: I couldn't find it.

original: Bell lived in London, right?

original: Come here boy.

original: We are not born for ourselves.
translated: Nous ne sommes pas nés pour nous-mêmes.

original: There is something about him I don't like.

translated: Les pièces de bois sont fixées à l'aide d'une cheville.

original: They expect me to help them.
translated: Ils s'attendent à ce que je les aide.

original: I do not even have a penny.
translated: Je n'ai plus un rond.

original: I thought you'd be dead by now.
translated: Je pensais que tu serais morte, à l'heure qu'il est.

original: My house has two flights of stairs.
translated: Ma maison comporte deux escaliers.

original: As long as we've driven this far, we might as well go on.
translated: Puisque nous avons conduit jusqu'ici, nous ferions aussi bien de continuer.

original: Farmers defaulting on loans had to auction off their land.
translated: Les fermiers en cessation de paiements devaient vendre leurs terres aux enchères.

original: I learned German for three years in school and two years in university.
translated: J'ai appris l'allemand pendant trois ans à l’école et deux ans à l’université.

original: How long will it take us to get to Boston?
translated: Il nous faut combien de temps pour arriver à Boston ?

original: Pray for them.
translated: Priez pour eux.

original: I follow the rules.
translated: Je suis les règles.

original: "How long will you be staying?" "I'll be staying for a month."
translated: Combien de temps resterez-vous ? - Je resterai un mois.

original: Tom doesn't like mashed potatoes.
translated: Tom n'aime pas la purée de pommes de terre.

original: Traffic was blocked by a landslide.
translated: Le trafic était bloqué par un glissement de terrain.

original: It saddens me to see how much you've misunderstood us.
translated: Je suis attristé de constater à quel point tu nous as mal compris.

original: What's your favorite class?
translated: Quel est ton cours préféré ?

original: I have no intention of changing.
translated: Je n'ai pas l'intention de changer.

original: I'm too old for this.
translated: Je suis trop vieille pour ça.

original: I take care of a cat and a dog.
translated: Je prends soin d'un chat et d'un chien.

original: She raised an important objection to his argument.
translated: Elle souleva une objection importante à son argument.

original: I can't believe you didn't recognize me.
translated: Je n'arrive pas à croire que tu ne m'aies pas reconnu.

original: I tried to explain it to him, but he doesn't understand.
translated: J'ai essayé de le lui expliquer, mais il ne comprend pas.

original: You must be very proud of your son.
translated: Tu dois être très fier de ton fils.

original: Some people never grow up.
translated: Certaines personnes ne murissent jamais.

original: It's driving me crazy.
translated: Ça me rend fou.

original: This sentence has seven words in it.
translated: Cette phrase est formée de sept mots.

original: That ended better than I expected.
translated: Cela se termina mieux que je ne m'y attendais.

original: People are gathering.
translated: Les gens se rassemblent.

original: I should've told Tom the truth.
translated: J'aurais dû dire la vérité à Tom.

original: She is hostile to me.
translated: Elle m'est hostile.

original: What time does this train reach Yokohama?
translated: À quelle heure arrive le train à Yokohama ?

original: He waited anxiously for his son.
translated: Il attendait anxieusement son fils.

original: The race was a photo finish.
translated: La course s'est jouée à la photo-finish.

original: She has a cold and is absent from school.
translated: Elle a un rhume et est absente de l'école.

original: Dan resolved to write a lengthy article to expose Linda's illegal deals.
translated: Dan décida d'écrire un long article afin d'y exposer les transactions illégales de Linda.

original: Guess where I've been.
translated: Devine où j'ai été.

original: If you see this message, write to me.
translated: Si vous voyez ce message, écrivez-moi.

original: Honesty pays in the long run.
translated: L'honnêteté paye à long terme.

original: He tiptoed into the room.
translated: Il entra dans la pièce sur la pointe des pieds.

original: It's the best-kept secret in town.
translated: C'est le secret le mieux gardé du moment.

original: Students generally like a teacher who understands their problems.
translated: Les étudiants apprécient généralement un professeur qui comprend leurs problèmes.

original: These are bad times.
translated: Les temps sont durs.

original: Did you say money or gold?
translated: Avez-vous dit l'argent ou l'or ?

original: You're a bundle of nerves.
translated: Tu es une boule de nerfs.

original: Be careful not to drink too much.
translated: Faites attention à ne pas trop boire !

original: Don't you wish you lived here?
translated: N'aimerais-tu pas vivre ici ?

original: Barbara regaled us with amazing stories about her trip to Tibet.
translated: Barbara nous a régalé de ses incroyables anecdotes à propos de son voyage au Tibet.

original: I'm not as rich as I was.
translated: Je ne suis pas aussi riche que je le fus.

original: Bob hit me, not her.
translated: C'est moi que Bob a frappé, et non elle.

original: Tom is an unusual kid.
translated: Tom est un enfant inhabituel.

original: Janet always lets me use her typewriter.
translated: Janette me laisse toujours utiliser sa machine à écrire.

original: Don't be upset.
translated: Ne soyez pas contrarié !

original: Do you approve of what he is doing?
translated: Approuvez-vous ce qu'il fait ?

original: Kabyles, write in Kabyle.
translated: Ô Kabyles, écrivez le kabyle.

original: I'm not satisfied with the restaurant's service.
translated: Je ne suis pas satisfait du service du restaurant.

original: The mountaineer was as hungry as a wolf.
translated: L'alpiniste avait une faim de loup.

original: That cheese is made from goat's milk.
translated: Ce fromage est préparé à partir de lait de chèvre.

original: Don't rub it in.
translated: Ne le serinez pas !

original: Down!
translated: À terre !

original: Go to bed!
translated: Va dormir !

original: I was saved as if by a miracle.
translated: J'ai été sauvée comme par miracle.

original: They have company.
translated: Elles ont de la visite.

original: This doesn't bode well for tomorrow.
translated: Ça ne présage rien de bon pour demain.
